overview: Lee and Julia's breakup was a disaster. What happens when they have to write that one last song together? Starring Haroula Rose, Rosanna Arquette and Daniel Ahearn. This film was featured on Paste and was in a number of film festivals including Cannes, Newport Beach, Bev Hills, Hollyshorts, Sun Valley, Miami Shorts, and Lone Star.
title: No Love Song
